001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.avaje;
002
003import java.lang.System.Logger;
004import java.util.ResourceBundle;
005
006import io.avaje.applog.AppLog;
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogRouter;
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.systemlogger.RainbowGumSystemLogger;
009import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
010
011/**
012 * Provides an Avaje logger to use RainbowGum global queue to avoid initialization issues.
013 */
014@ServiceProvider(AppLog.Provider.class)
015public class RainbowGumAppLog implements AppLog.Provider {
016
017        /**
018         * For service loader.
019         */
020        public RainbowGumAppLog() {
021        }
022
023        @Override
024        public Logger getLogger(String name) {
025                return RainbowGumSystemLogger.of(name, LogRouter.global());
026        }
027
028        @Override
029        public Logger getLogger(String name, ResourceBundle bundle) {
030                return getLogger(name);
031        }
032
033}
